title: Identify Memory Patterns in Time Series Using VSE
text: goal vse4ts identify memory patterns time series using variance scaling exponents. constructs variance scaling exponents, achieving identification memory patterns time series, especially long memory.

title: Identify Memory Patterns in Time Series Using VSE
text: can install development version vse4ts GitHub :

title: Identify Memory Patterns in Time Series Using VSE
text: basic example use vse function vse4ts package:
code: library(vse4ts) set.seed(123) x <- rnorm(1024) x.vse <- vse(x) print(x.vse) #> $vse #> [1] 0.4987233

title: Identify Memory Patterns in Time Series Using VSE
Calculate variance scaling exponents — vse
text: x time series vector. m parameter control number scales. Default 0.5.

what: Use the variance scale exponent method to construct a hypothesis test about long memory in time series — vse.test
